Rat_001.synopsis: Rat in the torture cell who is full of menace and going crazy because of how hungry she is.
Rat_001.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. teleport S_GOB_Torturers_Rat_0014. leave torture dialogue that starts automatically5. debug book - useful spells - petpalclick on rat

Spike_Dead.synopsis: Speak with dead: goblin torturer in camp. Non-Wyll version.

Rat_000.synopsis: Rat in the torture cell who is starving because all the prisoners have been carted away.
Rat_000.how_to_trigger: From crashsiteIn reCon: teleport S_GOB_Torturers_Rat_000leave torture dialogue that starts automaticallydebug book - useful spells - petpalclick on local rat

Spike.synopsis: The torturer that is/was torturing the adventurer.

Torture.synopsis: One of the goblins is torturing a prisoner, either to find out where the grove is, or just because he wants to. The player can try to get rid of him - if Shadowheart is present, she gives some advice on how to do so. If Shadowheart is the avatar, she has unique options criticising the goblin's techniques.
Torture.how_to_trigger: from crashsite:goto 318.94, 40.81, -19.95walk towards liam on torture rackdialogue triggers automatically

Goblet.synopsis: One of the guards standing next to the torture. He's mean (and a cannibal).

automatic_ordering.reasoning: To determine the order and mutual exclusivity of the sessions, I analyzed the relationships and logical flow of events described in their synopses. The session 'Torture' is pivotal as it involves the goblin torturer actively engaging with a prisoner. The presence of 'Spike' or 'Spike_Dead' suggests a focus on the goblin torturer either being alive or dead, which would naturally lead to mutually exclusive scenarios. Additionally, the sessions involving 'Rat_000' and 'Rat_001' both relate to rats in the torture cell, but 'Rat_001' appears to be the more advanced state of the scenario where the rat is driven mad, which implies it should follow 'Rat_000'. Thus, I established a sequential order and identified mutual exclusivity between 'Spike' and 'Spike_Dead'.

Rat_001_0.speaker: Rat
Rat_001_0.text: Let this one be! My prisoner, drow, not yours. Not this one. I am hungry... starving...

Rat_001_1.speaker: Rat
Rat_001_1.text: Rotting - he's rotting. Already turning green... Sweet and juicy, all for me. All for me.
Rat_001_1.context: NodeContext: She's contemplating eating her old master. She's mad because he didn't feed her.

Rat_001_3.speaker: Narrator
Rat_001_3.text: *The rat's nose twitches impatiently. Her teeth bite air as though it is flesh, but it doesn't sate her hunger.*

Rat_001_4.speaker: Rat
Rat_001_4.text: Let me kill - let me eat him. Nice, red red prisoner, full of meat. Let me eat - I am hungry, so hungry.

Spike_Dead_7.speaker: Narrator
Spike_Dead_7.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Spike_Dead_11.speaker: Narrator
Spike_Dead_11.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Spike_Dead_25.speaker: Torturer Spike
Spike_Dead_25.text: ... speaks through True Souls... scour the land... find weapon...

Spike_Dead_16.speaker: Player
Spike_Dead_16.text: Are there any valuables hidden nearby?

Spike_Dead_24.speaker: Torturer Spike
Spike_Dead_24.text: ... you... Blade of Frontiers... seeking your lady...

Spike_Dead_6.speaker: Torturer Spike
Spike_Dead_6.text: ... crush-smash... burn-whip-scream... give pain get answer...

Spike_Dead_10.speaker: Narrator
Spike_Dead_10.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Rat_000_1.speaker: Rat
Rat_000_1.text: A little bite... he don't look like he'd mind...
Rat_000_1.context: NodeContext: He's contemplating eating his dead master.

Rat_000_2.speaker: Narrator
Rat_000_2.text: *The rat's eyes follow you, shining. Its stomach grumbles.*

Spike_0.speaker: Torturer Spike
Spike_0.text: Torture's over, but ya can get a beer if yer lookin' for some fun.
Spike_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Player (but not this character) tortured the prisoner enough for the goblins to be satisfied.NodeContext: pleased. He watched another player torture the prisoner until the latter fainted. He's in a good mood.

Spike_1.speaker: Torturer Spike
Spike_1.text: Had a little sadist in ya after all, didn'tcha?
Spike_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Player tortured the prisoner enough for the goblins to be satisfied.NodeContext: Cruel and pleased. He watched the player torture the prisoner until the prisoner fainted,

Spike_2.speaker: Torturer Spike
Spike_2.text: Ya still 'ere? Go find the other slaves if ya like hangin' 'round 'ere so much.
Spike_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Player made long rest, goblins finished torture.NodeContext: a little surprised. He's mean because he's mean by nature, not because the player gave him a reason to be.

Spike_4.speaker: Torturer Spike
Spike_4.text: Bet ya couldn't make 'im sing either, could ya? I'd swear 'e was mute, if I hadn't heard 'im scream so much.
Spike_4.context: InternalNodeContext: Player persuaded goblins to go away and let him finish the torture.NodeContext: A little bit boastful. The player sent him away to continue the torture himself, and the torturer doesn't want to lose face because he wasn't able to extract the information from the prisoner.

Spike_5.speaker: Torturer Spike
Spike_5.text: Look who's 'ere. The little party-pooper. At least let me enjoy the beer.
Spike_5.context: InternalNodeContext: Player persuaded goblins to go away and let him finish the torture.NodeContext: Not too pleased. The player forced him to stop torturing the prisoner (and he liked torturing the prisoner).

Torture_32.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_32.text: He needs to die slowly, PAINFULLY. So keep yer amateur hands off him, or you're next!

Torture_200.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_200.text: I need him to bleed, to talk - not to die. So keep yer amateur hands off him, or you're next!

Torture_77.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_77.context: InternalNodeContext: Player character already talked, but chose to leave.

Torture_89.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_89.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin raises a club, ready to hit the adventurer, but then notices the player and stops.NodeContext: He's torturing an adventurer and getting sadistic pleasure from this.

Torture_42.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_42.text: Oh. You're back. Uh - he's all yours.
Torture_42.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

Torture_84.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_84.text: Come to see yer friend, have ya? Come an' join 'im, if ya like.
Torture_84.context: NodeContext: First time the goblin sees the player. He doesn't know who you are, so he's making assumptions.

Torture_226.speaker: Shadowheart
Torture_226.text: Say we'll take over. His work is sloppy; he'll kill the prisoner too quickly.
Torture_226.context: NodeContext: A discreet murmur. She's got special expertise here and knows how to manipulate the situation.

Torture_5.speaker: Player
Torture_5.text: This looks interesting - let me put him through his paces.

Torture_151.speaker: Player
Torture_151.text: I wanted to join in on the fun - let me put him through his paces.

Torture_158.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_158.text: Or what? Ya gonna start a fight?
Torture_158.context: NodeContext: challenging. He doesn't expect you to dare hurt him.

Torture_48.speaker: Player
Torture_48.text: Orders from Minthara. You wouldn't question her, would you?

Torture_146.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_146.text: I - I wasn't! I didn't know! C'mon, Grush, let's go!
Torture_146.context: NodeContext: We basically accused him of treason, which could mean his head.

Torture_152.speaker: Player
Torture_152.text: Your boss sent me. He wants the prisoner intact.

Torture_116.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_116.text: What does 'e think we'll do? Kill 'im?

Torture_72.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_72.text: Gah. Whatever. I was gettin' thirsty anyway.

Torture_227.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_227.text: Like 'e cares. And if 'e did, 'e wouldna sent no outsider to order us around.
Torture_227.context: NodeContext: He's calling the player's bluff.

Torture_115.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_115.text: Get lost - 'less ya want to get whipped, too.

Torture_30.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_30.text: Damn it!  Dunno why Minthara hasn't killed us yet, but it ain't gonna last.
Torture_30.context: NodeContext: He's annoyed. Someone was first in finding out where the grove is, which means he failed, which could have turned out really badly, but he blames all this on the adventurer.

Torture_43.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_43.text: One mistake and she'll have our heads. All because this stupid dimwit didn't wanna talk.
Torture_43.context: NodeContext: He's annoyed. Someone was first in finding out where the grove is, which means he failed, which could have turned out really badly, but he blames all this on the adventurer.

Torture_203.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_203.text: Come to see yer friend, have ya? Come an' join 'im, if ya like.

Torture_34.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_34.text: You again? Wanna join 'im this time?

Torture_17.speaker: Player
Torture_17.text: Why are you still torturing him?

Torture_162.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_162.text: Some other git found the grove before we did. Made us look real stupid, 'e did.
Torture_162.context: NodeContext: a little sour at the memory

Torture_97.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_97.text: So now we're makin' sure this lad regrets not tellin' us.
Torture_97.context: NodeContext: deriving sadistic pleasure from this.

Torture_93.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_93.text: Poor lad. I could give ya peace, ya know.
Torture_93.context: InternalNodeContext: First encounter of player character with the goblins torturer.NodeContext: He's secretly deriving pleasure from this.

Torture_157.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_157.text: But nooo! Ya gotta keep silent, don'tcha? Where'd they flee to, ya stubborn RAT?

Torture_12.speaker: Liam
Torture_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin raises a club, ready to hit the adventurer, but then notices the player and stops.NodeContext: scared, he's being tortured.

Torture_90.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_90.text: Oh, a drow? I - I didn't see ya there.
Torture_90.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

Torture_95.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_95.text: Please. Uh. If you wanna have a try?
Torture_95.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

Torture_39.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_39.text: The git didn't wanna work with us. Tried t' keep the whereabouts of 'is gang a secret.
Torture_39.context: NodeContext: a little sour at the memory

Torture_109.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_109.text: So now we're teachin' 'im 'is place. 'Course, now that you're 'ere... we'd gladly let ya take over!
Torture_109.context: NodeContext: grovelling. He's scared of the player.

Torture_76.speaker: Player
Torture_76.text: Give me your club - Minthara asked me to assist you.

Torture_50.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_50.text: O-of course. Uhm - but maybe not this club. It ain't worthy of you drow types.
Torture_50.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to. They asked him to give him his club so they can torture the prisoner, but he doesn't want to give that exact club since he thinks it's too lowly for the player.

Torture_139.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_139.text: But there's some tongue-looseners in the fire, if you want 'em! We'll leave ya to it.
Torture_139.context: NodeContext: He just refused the player (who is much higher rank and potentially very dangerous) his own club, but is quick to suggest some other weapons he thinks are better suited.

Torture_94.speaker: Player
Torture_94.text: I don't try - I get results. Move aside.

Torture_167.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_167.text: O-of course! There's weapons in the fire if you want 'em. Uhm. We'll leave ya to it.
Torture_167.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

Torture_103.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_103.text: Oh, I couldn't! N-not with an expert 'ere!
Torture_103.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank. He's aftraid they will kill him if they decide he isn't doing a good job, so he wants to flee.

Torture_8.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_8.text: Please. We've got some tongue-looseners in the fire if you want 'em. Uhm. We'll leave ya to it!
Torture_8.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank. He's aftraid they will kill him if they decide he isn't doing a good job, so he wants to flee.

Torture_28.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_28.text: Come Grush, let's go. I don't think I got the stomach for this.
Torture_28.context: NodeContext: Quetly. He's talking to his friend, and doesn't really want the player to hear.

Torture_166.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_166.text: 'Ere to see yer friend, have ya? Come an' join 'im, if ya like.
Torture_166.context: NodeContext: First time the goblin sees the player. He doesn't know who you are, so he's making assumptions.

Torture_60.speaker: Shadowheart
Torture_60.text: Say we'll take over. His work is sloppy; he'll kill the prisoner too quickly.
Torture_60.context: NodeContext: A discreet whisper of advice in the player's ear, trying to get a goblin torturer to leave.

Torture_209.speaker: Narrator
Torture_209.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

Torture_59.speaker: Narrator
Torture_59.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

Torture_207.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_207.text: The man on it is a bit short though, don't you think 'e could be longer?

Torture_215.speaker: Player
Torture_215.text: I'll take over - unless you want the drow to learn of your failures.

Torture_9.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_9.text: The git snuck in 'ere with 'is mates, lookin' for some forgotten thing. Said they ran to some kinda grove.

Torture_10.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_10.text: 'E doesn't wanna tell us where it is, but he can't resist forever.
Torture_10.context: NodeContext: Looking forward to torturing the adventurer some more.

Torture_47.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_47.text: 'Course, now that you're 'ere... we'd gladly let ya take over!
Torture_47.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

Torture_6.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_6.text: The git tried t' keep the location of 'is little adventure friends a secret. Made us look real stupid.
Torture_6.context: NodeContext: a little sour at the memory

Torture_194.speaker: Player
Torture_194.text: Give me your club - Minthara asked me to assist you.

Torture_191.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_191.text: What? That drow think I can't do my job? Go on, let's see how hard you can make 'im scream.

Torture_4.speaker: Liam
Torture_4.context: NodeContext: scared - he's about to get tortured again and he's begging the player to reconsider.

Torture_92.speaker: Narrator
Torture_92.text: *Face the prisoner. Consider the implements provided. Then...*
Torture_92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera should shift away here, so as not to animate the torture scene. Either to the fire or to the ground where we could see blood leaking or a leg spasming or something.

Torture_145.speaker: Player
Torture_145.text: You are about to have the best day of your miserable life!

Torture_25.speaker: Player
Torture_25.text: Would you like to start begging for mercy now, or...?

Torture_199.speaker: Liam
Torture_199.context: NodeContext: He has been tortured, but still has a little spirit. Full of hatred.

Torture_172.speaker: Player
Torture_172.text: Would you like to start begging for mercy now, or...?

Torture_182.speaker: Player
Torture_182.text: ... smash the butt of a spear into his groin.

Torture_138.speaker: Liam
Torture_138.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player smashes spear into liams groinNodeContext: There should be a sharp crack from Liam's nose breaking before he starts begging.

Torture_88.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_88.text: That all ya got? Bein' soft ain't gonna make 'im talk.
Torture_88.context: NodeContext: He's urging you on to use more gruesome torture tactics.

Torture_150.speaker: Player
Torture_150.text: Smash a club into his knee.

Torture_148.speaker: Narrator
Torture_148.text: *The prisoner smiles through the pain, then spits in your direction.*

Torture_105.speaker: Liam
Torture_105.context: NodeContext: He has been tortured, but still has a little spirit. Full of hatred.

Torture_56.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_56.text: And 'e was just about to scream. Get out. Out!

Torture_154.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_154.text: And 'e was just about to talk. Get out. Out!

Torture_120.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_120.text: Should've known you'd be soft. Get out!

Torture_102.speaker: Player
Torture_102.text: Smash a club into his knee.

Torture_2.speaker: Player
Torture_2.text: Rip off a toenail with a pair of tongs.

Torture_117.speaker: Player
Torture_117.text: Crank the rack and stretch him.

Torture_134.speaker: Liam
Torture_134.text: No! P-please, why... s-stop... pl...ease... I -
Torture_134.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer faints in the middle of the node.NodeContext: He's been tortured so badly he loses consciousness at the end.

Torture_66.speaker: Liam
Torture_66.text: No! P-please, we... t-to the east.
Torture_66.context: NodeContext: He's been tortured so badly he's going to lose consciousness soon.

Torture_149.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_149.context: NodeContext: Surprised and angry, the player suddenly pulled his weapon on the goblin to attack.

Torture_86.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_86.text: That all ya got? Bein' soft ain't gonna make 'im scream.

Torture_163.speaker: Player
Torture_163.text: ... press a red hot poker against his thigh.

Torture_41.speaker: Narrator
Torture_41.text: *The stench of charred flesh wafts over you.*
Torture_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player presses poker into liam

Torture_29.speaker: Liam
Torture_29.context: NodeContext: Very panicky and in pain.

Torture_186.speaker: Narrator
Torture_186.text: *You don't know why, but you are really good at this.*
Torture_186.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark urge very very happy

Torture_73.speaker: Narrator
Torture_73.text: *You never want this perfect moment to come to an end.*

Torture_106.speaker: Player
Torture_106.text: Smash a club into his knee.

Torture_20.speaker: Liam
Torture_20.text: AARGH! P-please, we... t-to the east.
Torture_20.context: NodeContext: He's been tortured so badly he's going to lose consciousness soon.

Torture_192.speaker: Liam
Torture_192.text: P-past the ruins and... the bridge. They c-covered the gate with ivy...
Torture_192.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer faints in the middle of the node.NodeContext: He has a hard time talking and faints after mentioning the ivy.

Torture_124.speaker: Liam
Torture_124.text: AARGH! P-please, why... s-stop... pl...ease... I -
Torture_124.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer faints in the middle of the node.

Torture_161.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_161.context: NodeContext: He's amused that the adventurer fainted.

Torture_98.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_98.text: An' you yerself, you're a nasty piece of work!

Torture_87.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_87.text: An' we got what we needed. Ya weren't 'alf bad. Drow'll be happy when she hears it.

Torture_126.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_126.text: Well, party's over. No fun kickin' a beaten dog. Let's go.
Torture_126.context: NodeContext: He's disgusted and disappointed that the adventurer fainted so soon from being tortured too much.

Torture_1.speaker: Player
Torture_1.text: This looks interesting - let me put him through his paces.

Torture_202.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_202.text: Bloodthirsty, ain't ya? HA. Go on then: make 'im scream.

Torture_37.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_37.text: Bloodthirsty, ain't ya? HA. Go on then: make 'im scream.

Torture_221.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_221.text: We know all about 'is secret hideout by now, so let's see what else ya can make 'im say.
Torture_221.context: NodeContext: Looking forward to what you're going to do.

Torture_212.speaker: Player
Torture_212.text: I wanted to join in on the fun - let me put him through his paces.

Torture_26.speaker: Narrator
Torture_26.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

Torture_168.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_168.text: S-sorry, I didn't realise! He's all yours!
Torture_168.context: NodeContext: He's afraid. He suddenly realises he's been talking down to someone of a much higher rank.

Torture_16.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_16.text: Just... don't be too rough, maybe? Moonrise Towers might still want to take 'im.
Torture_16.context: NodeContext: He's afraid because he's talking to someone of a much higher rank.

Torture_114.speaker: Narrator
Torture_114.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

Torture_133.speaker: Narrator
Torture_133.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

Torture_219.speaker: Narrator
Torture_219.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

Torture_44.speaker: Narrator
Torture_44.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

Torture_107.speaker: Narrator
Torture_107.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

Torture_190.speaker: Narrator
Torture_190.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

Torture_45.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_45.text: What? You think you can order me around? Get lost 'fore I beat ya to a pulp.
Torture_45.context: NodeContext: challenging. He doesn't expect you to dare hurt him.

Torture_181.speaker: Player
Torture_181.text: Go have yourselves a drink. Your boss sent me to relieve you.

Torture_69.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_69.text: We do all the work an' you get to finish 'im?

Torture_14.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_14.text: Bah. Take 'im. Won't do ya any good. 'E just... screams.

Torture_144.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_144.text: Should've sent 'im to Moonrise with the rest, for all the good he's been.
Torture_144.context: NodeContext: Kind of mumbling, still displeased.

Torture_129.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_129.text: You? I'll believe that when I see it.

Torture_196.speaker: Player
Torture_196.text: I'm a little out of practice. Another time.

Torture_201.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_201.text: Get out, then. Wastin' my time like that.

Torture_185.speaker: Player
Torture_185.text: I'm taking over. Your sloppy handiwork is going to kill the prisoner too quickly.

Torture_122.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_122.text: What, think you can do better? HA. Go on then, have at it.

Torture_70.speaker: Player
Torture_70.text: I don't put on shows for amateurs. Leave.

Torture_19.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_19.text: What, you shy or something? Fine! Muck it up and the drow'll have your head.

Torture_179.speaker: Player
Torture_179.text: Fine. Let me show you what real talent looks like.

Torture_225.speaker: Player
Torture_225.text: I am going to do something so awful it would scare even you to watch.

Torture_174.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_174.text: Oh, I'd like to see you try.

Torture_169.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_169.text: Think you'd fare better? Fine - prove it.

Torture_228.speaker: Player
Torture_228.text: Beating him with a club? Really? Sloppy and unoriginal. Stand aside.

Torture_51.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_51.text: You what? Think I'll stand 'ere while some pointy-eared bint explains my job to me?!

Torture_3.speaker: Player
Torture_3.text: No. Stand someplace else and let a professional get to work.

Torture_121.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_121.text: Think you're better? Fine! He's all yours - muck it up and you'll answer to the drow.

Torture_230.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_230.text: Heh. Maybe she'll send you back here to take his place. Then I'll show you what I can do.

Torture_141.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_141.text: C'mon Grush. There might still be a slurp o' ale to be had.

Torture_54.speaker: Player
Torture_54.text: Look - you haven't even gone for the fingernails. Amateur!

Torture_195.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_195.text: Think you can do better? Fine - prove it.

Torture_104.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_104.text: No. NO! Why won't 'e speak?! The drow's gonna kill me if I can't make 'im talk!

Torture_61.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_61.text: What d'ya think you're doin'? Ya tryin' to get into my head? I'll teach ya!
Torture_61.context: NodeContext: he's angry the player tried to read his mind.

Torture_206.speaker: Narrator
Torture_206.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

Torture_96.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_96.text: 'Ere to see yer friend, have ya? Come an' join 'im, if ya like.

Torture_101.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_101.text: I warned you, I WARNED you not to touch him. And now you'll PAY.

Torture_153.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_153.text: M-my drowness, if you wanted a try at torture, you only had to say so!

Torture_165.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_165.text: Oh. You're back. Uh - he's all yours.
Torture_165.context: InternalNodeContext: Player character already talked, but chose to leave.

Torture_180.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_180.text: What're you still 'ere for? I said OUT!
Torture_180.context: InternalNodeContext: This player character failed the torture.NodeContext: angry and annoyed that the player hasn't left yet after he failed the torture.

Goblet_0.speaker: Lookout Grush
Goblet_0.text: I'm watchin' ya. Spike promised that any meat that falls off is mine.
Goblet_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: He's standing a few paces away from the prisoner.NodeContext: Mean.

Goblet_1.speaker: Lookout Grush
Goblet_1.text: Keep yer mitts off the prisoner. 'E's mine. MINE.
Goblet_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: He's standing a few paces away from the prisoner.NodeContext: disgruntled and a little crazy. He didn't actually see you do anything, but he's suspicious.

Goblet_2.speaker: Lookout Grush
Goblet_2.text: Ya didn't touch my prisoner, didya? 'E's mine. Mine!
Goblet_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: He might not be standing next to the prisoner anymore.NodeContext: disgruntled and a little crazy. He didn't actually see you do anything, but he's suspicious.
